cast.overview: Natasha Romanoff, also known as Black Widow, confronts the darker parts of her ledger when a dangerous conspiracy with ties to her past arises. Pursued by a force that will stop at nothing to bring her down, Natasha must deal with her history as a spy and the broken relationships left in her wake long before she became an Avenger.
cast.title: Black Widow

crew.overview: One man's campaign for vengeance takes on national stakes after he is revealed to be a former operative of a powerful and clandestine organization known as Beekeepers.
crew.title: The Beekeeper

crew.overview: Natasha Romanoff, also known as Black Widow, confronts the darker parts of her ledger when a dangerous conspiracy with ties to her past arises. Pursued by a force that will stop at nothing to bring her down, Natasha must deal with her history as a spy and the broken relationships left in her wake long before she became an Avenger.
crew.title: Black Widow

crew.overview: Paddington, now happily settled with the Browns, picks up a series of odd jobs to buy the perfect present for his Aunt Lucy, but it is stolen.
crew.title: Paddington 2

details.biography: Lucy-Jayne Murray is a Taurus World Stunt Award Winning lead Stunt Double and martial artist. Other accolades include TWSA nominations, SAG wins and nominations, and academic degrees in Law and in History. She has been known to attend schools and other educational facilities to deliver motivational speaking having been inspired when younger to present school speeches as Head Girl and a County of Kent and London winning public speaker. She was also invited to the National Academy of Gifted and Talented Youth as well as the National Youth Theatre.
details.name: Lucy-Jayne Murray
